response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $950,000. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the unique benefits and experiences it offers. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 950000}
